stories.title: Important Security Update for JetBrains Gateway

stories.text:
Since YouTube geoblocks and requires account creation, it's not always a frictionless way to share video. Does anyone know of a pastebin/imgur equivalent for video?

In recent years it's become trivial to clip part or all of the screen as a video (on macOS, for example: Shift + Command + 5).

It would be extremely useful to know of a pastebin/imgur for video, if it exists?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is there a pastebin/imgur for video?

stories.text: Is there any research that considers how much CO2 is actually captured by the cows (i.e. the grass traps the CO2 the cow eats the grass)? Also any research on whether or not cows prevent fires by eating grass? If they do isn't there some kind of opportunity cost to be realized?
stories.title: Ask HN: What are considered the goto papers for CO2 emissions for cows?
